seeds.title: Newsletter digest / inbox declutter
seeds.spark: Auto-scan inbox daily, surface the 3 most important things, archive the rest. Less email anxiety.

seeds.title: Meeting action item extraction
seeds.spark: Connect Fathom or Otter transcript â†’ Kip pulls action items â†’ drops them in todos automatically. Zero manual capture.

seeds.title: Encrypted Google Drive backups
seeds.spark: Auto-backup workspace files to Drive nightly. Needs Google Drive API. Insurance against losing everything.

seeds.title: Model routing logic
seeds.spark: Sonnet vs Opus auto-selector based on task complexity. Quick replies = Sonnet, deep research = Opus. Cut API costs by 60%.

seeds.title: Bull Stories social media growth
seeds.spark: Automated post scheduling for @BSBullStories2026. Track views, comments, engagement. Grow to 10K before approaching Yeti/Marriott.

seeds.title: Mac mini for Kip 24/7
seeds.spark: Dedicated hardware = no WSL limits, no sleep, always-on. Can run more aggressive crons. Phase 2 after bridge round.

seeds.title: Auto follow-up email sequences
seeds.spark: Day 3, Day 7, Day 14 investor follow-ups drafted and queued automatically when no reply detected. Never let a warm lead go cold by accident.

seeds.title: LinkedIn outreach automation
seeds.spark: Connect + personalized message to warm leads at scale. Needs Browser Relay to work. Would 10x outreach velocity.

seeds.title: Investor match scoring AI
seeds.spark: Score every CRM contact by fit: cancer interest + check size + stage + geography. Surface top 3 to pursue each week automatically.

seeds.title: Voice interface for Kip
seeds.spark: Talk to Kip like a walkie-talkie while driving, walking, thinking out loud. Record â†’ transcribe â†’ act. ADHD-friendly capture mode.

seeds.title: Agent-powered idea validator
seeds.spark: 40 agents research your startup idea: search volume, YouTube comments, competition, execution plan, timing. Scores: Opportunity / Feasibility / Why Now. Build for HelioFlux investor research first.

seeds.title: The Clawculator
seeds.spark: Answer 5 questions about your work â†’ get personalized agent recs + hours saved estimate + monthly API cost. Lead magnet. Already pitched to AIDB as the Clawrchitect concept â€” they know this idea.

seeds.title: Agent Roast
seeds.spark: Submit your AGENTS.md â†’ get a brutally honest AI review. What's missing, overcomplicated, brilliant. Viral shareability. Great Twitter campaign for Napoleon or Kelly's personal brand.

seeds.title: Agent Templates Gallery
seeds.spark: Downloadable AGENTS.md + SOUL.md starter kits: 'The Fundraiser,' 'The Content Machine,' 'The Job Hunter.' Drop into OpenClaw and go in 10 minutes. Huge demand from non-technical founders.

seeds.title: Agent Mission Control panel
seeds.spark: Shows each agent's up/down status, last run, cost, errors. Add Scout + Quill status to Command Center. Real ops visibility for the whole team.

seeds.title: HelioFlux Reddit monitor
seeds.spark: Watch r/biotech, r/investing, r/cancer for biophotonics and early detection mentions. Daily Telegram briefing on what the internet is saying. Spot investor conversations in the wild.

seeds.title: Knowledge graph memory
seeds.spark: TypeDB-style graph memory: Collections â†’ Things â†’ Artifacts â†’ Fragments. Flat .md files can't do relational queries. Someday: 'who mentioned HelioFlux + is a VC + in LA' returns in one query.

seeds.title: Music as a scheduled recharge block
seeds.spark: Kelly produces music and it prevents burnout â€” but it competes with work time. What if it was calendared, not optional? Protected creative time = more productive rest of week. Treat it like sleep.

seeds.title: HelioFlux consumer app
seeds.spark: $99/year subscription for annual biophotonic cancer screening at a partner clinic. The AncestryDNA of cancer detection. Direct-to-consumer peace of mind. Phase 4 idea â€” not for now but worth planting.

seeds.title: Founder dating app
seeds.spark: Co-founder matching done right â€” swipe on missions not job titles. Match on complementary skills + working styles + risk tolerance. One-week 'trial project' before committing. YC, EF, CoFoundersLab all feel like LinkedIn.

seeds.title: HelioFlux supporter newsletter
seeds.spark: Monthly update sent to everyone in CRM â€” investors, advisors, supporters, press. They feel in the journey. When you raise, they already know you. 480 contacts = 480 potential subscribers. Substack or Beehiiv.

seeds.title: F1 x HelioFlux pitch angle
seeds.spark: F1 teams obsess over driver health data and peak performance monitoring. Biophotonic sensing for real-time athlete health. Red Bull Racing has a health science team. Niche but deeply memorable investor story.

seeds.title: Daily idea jog
seeds.spark: Every afternoon at 2pm Kip sends a random past idea as a brain spark â€” 'hey remember this?' Prevents good ideas from dying in the inbox. Already live as a cron.

seeds.title: Respondent.io expert interviews
seeds.spark: Your founder + bio + MBA profile = premium research participant bracket. $50-200 per 30-60 min call. Passive income â€” set it up once and studies find you.

seeds.title: Remotasks / DataAnnotation stack
seeds.spark: Two parallel AI training platforms for income. DataAnnotation assessment submitted. Remotasks = backup / stacker. Biology tasks $30-40/hr, science QA $50/hr.
